replies.body: Riot, these prices truly show how you are thankful for the League of Legends Community. Thank you!

**[http://reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/secretBONUS](http://www.leaguerewards.net)
**  - I found this link today use it while you can!

Huh, funny. It's almost like this name was randomly generated.


At least make REAL names if you want to fool people.
funny you should say that "BOZO"
Dont think you know what a generated name is.. lol.
Oh, it was a mistake.
why are the prices so low!
Because they made a mistake. But unlike most reputable companies they decided to not honor their mistake and instead changed the prices.
their "mistake" was probably just a typo by one riot employee. Why should the mistake of one person cut back on more of Riot's revenue?

Mistakes happen. But typically when a company advertises a sale, they stand by the numbers even if they are wrong to show that they care about their customers as long as it does not result in a significant financial loss.

It was definitely not a typo. Someone actually went to the work of taking the 50% off price and further reducing that price by another 50%. That takes a conscious effort. And this is not the first time it has happened.
tell me that the only reason i bought the champs on sell thought they were half the price they are but ohh well not much of a sale though when theyy have champs half price every few days

They are the same prices in sales i dont see a difference its always been 487 if its a 975 and 260 for 520 and 375 for 750 so i dont see why ur making a big deal but yeah thnak you riot for your awesome sales

Riot, plz, Death Blosso.....you know what, just forget it =/

Happy Thanksgiving.  I'm at least thankful this game exists
They should just give it to you at this point lol

happy thanksgiving everyone! God bless you!

They had 50% off the 50% sale price. So shyvana skin was suppose to be 520rp to 260rp but they had it from 260rp to 130rp and this was for all of the skins and champs. Now they fixed it. Don't know if anyone purchased it when it was really low and if it worked or not
This is just the sale being announced but the sale wouldn't be active in the store until tomorrow so I don't think anyone would have been able to buy anything at the sale price before they fixed it.
No, but they could have purchased RP in anticipation of the upcoming sale. And now the sale has changed.
Yeah... but that has nothing to do with the Champion prices that we were referring to.
Is this not a sale?
